document.masterDocTitle: World Catalogue of the Druid Flies (Diptera: Schizophora: Clusiidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: World Catalogue of the Druid Flies (Diptera: Schizophora: Clusiidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Aristohendelia Frey 1960 : 14 (as subgenus) [family and genus revision, key to subgenera and species, Indoaustralia, catalogue, World]. Gender feminine. Type species,
Hendelia extensicornis Frey 1960
, by original designation. Sasakawa 1977 : 238 [catalogue, Orient]; Lonsdale & Marshall 2007b : 120 [as synonym of
Hendelia
].

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Burmanochorea
Frey 1960 : 14
(as subgenus) [family and genus revision, key to subgenera and species, Indoaustralia, catalogue, world]. Type species,
Hendelia variabilis Frey 1960
, by original designation. Gender feminine.
Sasakawa 1977 : 238
[catalogue, Orient];
Lonsdale & Marshall 2007b : 120
[as synonym of
Hendelia
].

Prohendelia
Frey 1960 : 13
(as subgenus) [family and genus revision, key to subgenera and species, family and genus revision, Indoaustralia, catalogue, world]. Type species,
Hendelia orientalis Frey 1960
, by original designation. Gender feminine.
Soós 1963a : 177
[new status as genus, key, relationship to
Hendelia
and
Parahendelia
], 1964a: 7 [key];
Sasakawa 1977 : 238
[catalogue, Orient];
Balthazar 1990 : 417
[catalogue, Philippines ];
Lonsdale & Marshall 2007b : 120
[as synonym of
Hendelia
].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Microclusiaria Frey 1960 : 19 (as subgenus) [family and genus revision, key to subgenera and species, Indoaustralia, catalogue, world]. Gender feminine. Type species,
Clusiodes obscuripennis Frey 1960
, by original designation. Sasakawa 1977 : 237 [catalogue, Orient]; Balthazar 1990 : 417 [catalogue, Philippines ];
Papp et al . 2006
: 190 [identified and unidentified species; Thailand ]. Lonsdale & Marshall 2007b : 120 [as synonym of
Hendelia
].

Steleoclusiodes Frey 1960 : 18 (as subgenus) [family and genus revision, key to subgenera and species, Indoaustralia, catalogue, world]. Type species,
Clusiodes nigrifrons Frey 1960
, by original designation. Gender masculine. Sasakawa 1977 : 237 [catalogue, Orient], 1987: 101 [key, Orient/Pacific]; Lonsdale & Marshall 2007b : 120 [as synonym of
Hendelia
].

Parahendelia
McAlpine 1960 : 83
. Type species,
Parahendelia latifrons McAlpine 1960
, by original designation (=
Hendelia armiger Lonsdale & Marshall
). Gender feminine.

[key, relationship to
Hendelia
and
Prohendelia
], 1964a: 4 [key];

[catalogue, Australasia/Pacific].
Marshall 2000 : 5
[as junior synonym of
Clusiodes
);
Lonsdale & Marshall 2007b : 120
[as synonym of
Hendelia
].
